parameter.name: N
parameter.comment: number of processes in the system

assumption.equn: a > 0.0 and b > 0.0 and a < b
assumption.comment: a *stictly less than* b for mutual exclusion

property.equn: forall i ((q[i] == start) implies (x[i] <= a))
forall i ((q[i] == CS) implies (x[i] >= b))
forall i ((q[i] == start) implies (x[i] < a))
forall i ((q[i] == idle) implies (x[i] == 0.0))
forall i ((q[i] == idle) implies (g == 0))
forall i ((q[i] == check) implies (g == i or g == 0))
forall i j ((i != j and q[i] == check and x[j] >= x[i]) implies (g == i))
forall i ((q[i] == CS) implies (g != 0))
forall i ((q[i] != idle) implies (g != 0))
forall i j ((i != j and q[i] == CS) implies (q[j] != start))
forall i ((q[i] == CS) implies (g == i))
forall i j ((i != j and q[i] == CS and g == i) implies (q[j] != CS))
property.comment: non-inductive: there could already be some other process j in CS: need to have if q[i] == CS => g == i

property.equn: forall i j ((i != j and q[i] == CS and x[j] < b) implies (q[j] != CS))
forall i j ((q[i] == idle) implies (q[j] != start))
forall i j ((q[i] == idle) implies (q[j] != idle))
forall i ((q[i] == start) implies (g == 0))
forall i ((q[i] == idle or q[i] == start) implies (g == 0))
forall i j ((i != j and q[i] == CS and g == i) implies (q[j] != CS))
forall i j ((i != j and q[i] == CS and q[j] == start) implies (x[i] > x[j]))
forall i j ((i != j and q[i] == CS and q[j] != CS) implies (x[i] > x[j]))
forall i j ((i != j) implies (q[i] != CS or q[j] != CS))
forall i j ((i != j and q[i] == CS) implies (q[j] != CS))
forall i j ((i != j and q[i] == CS and q[j] != check) implies (g == i))
forall i j ((i != j and q[i] == CS and x[j] < a) implies (g == i))
forall i ((q[i] == CS) implies (g == i))
forall i ((g == i) implies (q[i] == CS))
forall i ((g != i) implies (q[i] != CS))
